Title: Illuminated Chapter Heading for Chapter 113 of the Qur'an
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This text page from Walters manuscript W.562 has lines of vocalized Muhaqqaq script with an illuminated chapter heading for chapter 113 (Surat al-falaq). The chapter heading is written in New Abbasid (Broken Cursive) style in gold ink on a blue ground with red arabesques.
Keywords: Arabic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Iran; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Medallion; Ornament; Prayer; Qur`an; Scripture; Timurid; New Abbasid Style
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian (?)
